title: “Biden up, Trump down, Covid rising.” (with Alyssa Mastromonaco!)
description: Alyssa Mastromonaco joins as a guest host to talk about the Covid resurgence, what Tuesday’s progressive primary victories mean for the Democratic Party, and Joe Biden’s commanding lead over Donald Trump in the battleground states. Then Jamaal Bowman talks to Tommy about his upset victory in the primary for New York’s 16th Congressional district.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
